SETS.NODES: \text{Total number of nodes in the octagonal grid}
SETS.EDGES: \text{Total number of edges in the octagonal grid}

PARAMETERS.name: L_E
PARAMETERS.query: Unit length of a grid edge

VARIABLES.name: path_length_i
VARIABLES.query: Continuous variable representing the length of path i

VARIABLES.name: turn_count_i
VARIABLES.query: Continuous variable representing the number of turns in path i

VARIABLES.name: path_i
VARIABLES.query: Binary variable indicating if path i exists

OBJECTIVE.query: Minimize the weighted sum of the total path length and the total number of turns across all N paths

CONSTRAINTS.name: path_disjointness
CONSTRAINTS.description: Each node and edge on the grid layer can be occupied by only one path (no re-use or sharing)
CONSTRAINTS.query: Ensure that each node and edge is used by at most one path
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \forall j, k, l, m, n, p, q, r, s \in \text{nodes}, \forall i \in \{1, \dots, N\}: x_{i,j,k,l} + x_{i,m,n,o} \leq 1

CONSTRAINTS.name: non_crossing_condition
CONSTRAINTS.description: Paths must not cross or overlap each other in the 2D plane
CONSTRAINTS.query: Ensure that paths do not intersect
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \forall j, k, l, m, n, p, q, r, s \in \text{nodes}, \forall i, j \in \{1, \dots, N\}: p_{i,j,k,l} - p_{j,i,m,n} \geq 0 \land p_{j,i,m,n} - p_{i,j,k,l} \geq 0

CONSTRAINTS.name: movement_limitations
CONSTRAINTS.description: From any given node, movement is restricted to 8 adjacent directions (horizontal, vertical, and the four diagonals)
CONSTRAINTS.query: Ensure that the movement is within the allowed directions
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \forall j, k, l, m, n, p, q, r, s \in \text{nodes}, \forall i \in \{1, \dots, N\}: \sum_{d \in \{1, \dots, 8\}} x_{i,j+k\cdot d, k+l\cdot d, l+m\cdot d} \leq 1

CONSTRAINTS.name: curvature_constraint
CONSTRAINTS.description: Any edge along a path cannot deviate by more than 45 degrees from the direction of the previous edge
CONSTRAINTS.query: Ensure that the curvature constraint is satisfied
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \forall j, k, l, m, n, p, q, r, s \in \text{nodes}, \forall i \in \{1, \dots, N\}: \left|\frac{p_{i,j,k,l} - p_{i-1,j,k,l}}{t_{i,j,k,l}} - \frac{p_{i-1,j,k,l}
